docs.abstract: NFL commissioner Roger Goodell's strategy of hiring former FBI director Robert S Mueller III to investigate league's handling of domestic violence case involving former Baltimore Ravens running back Ray Rice has its dangers, as Mueller will want to be as thorough as possible and not appear in any way craven to his employer.
